/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the towering buildings that line the street. These buildings, painted in hues of red and orange, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On either side of the street, trees and bushes provide a touch of greenery, contrasting with the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
